channel.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
channel.description:
[Main Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/master-rework-of-doom/47102)
> **[color=green]King (Random Special)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Head of State: All your votes for accusation count as two. Your actions do not count as visits, and you cannot be occupied or redirected. If you are the Psycho King, you are immune at night. > > Passive: Loyal Subjects: If you are executed, there will be no trial tomorrow. Good and Foolish King only. > > Passive: Failure: If your target dies, or you have no target night 3, you will commit suicide. Protective King only. > > Day Ability: Decide Fate: Determine the outcome of a trial. One use. If you are the Starting Vengeful King, you cannot use this on either of your targets. 1 use. > > Day Ability: Offer Protection: Choose a player. They will be your target for the rest of the game. Must be used day 3 or before. Protective King Only. (Should also replace Mercenary Offer Contract) > > Night Ability: Guards!: Protect a player from death. If you are the Starting Good King, this will also protect against conversions. If you are the Protective King and you are using this on your target, it will prevent all visits. 4 uses. Does not appear on Psycho King. > > Night Ability: Fatal Guards: Kill a player. Psycho King only. Infinite uses. > > Night Ability: Order Execution: Kill a player, bypassing death immunity. This action will be announced to the Court. 2 uses, starting King only.
* Good King: Guards protect from conversion.
* Evil King: Identical to now.
* Vengeful King: Crowned from Scorned, keeps targets. If starting, has random targets and cannot use Decide Fate on their target. Scorned Win Condition.
* Foolish King: Mechanically identical to Good King, but has Fool Win Condition and Guards are normal and don't protect from conversions. (and Butler won't suicide). Crowned from Fool.
* Protective King: Crowned from Mercenary, keeps target. If they are the Starting King, they will choose target. Guards on target protect from all visits, other Guards act normally.
* Cowardly King: Same as the Neutral King.
* Patient King: Converted from Merchant, keeps Merchant Win Condition.
* Psycho King: Identical to now.
New spawn chances: > Good: 60% > Evil: 30% > Vengeful: 5% > Protective: 5%
> **[color=grey]Reaper (Neutral Killer)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Consume Soul: If you die at night with at least one soul, you will consume it and come back to life. You start with two souls. > > Day Ability: Icy Touch: Same. > > Day Ability: Gather Darkness: Costs two souls. You cannot be occupied tonight, and your target cannot be healed or guarded, and you bypass immunity. > > Night Ability: Reap: Reap the soul of a player, killing them and leaving an empty body for a day. You may see and edit their logs the next day.
> **[color=grey]Sorcerer (Neutral Killer)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Mage Armor: Immune to death at night, occupation, target changing, poison and bleeding. > > Passive: Rivalry: Your primary ability has a one day cool down until the other Neutral Killer dies. > > Day Ability: Power Shot: Magic Magic Missile bypasses immunity tonight. 3 uses. > > Day Ability: Magic Cloak: You will appear to be not magic to the Inquisitor, and as Blue Dragon. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Magic Missile: Fire a magic missile at a player, killing them. If you fail, you do nothing. If you use while on Cool down, learn the player's class type. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability: Circle of Death: Everyone visiting target player will die, bypassing Immunity 2 uses.
> **[color=grey]Inquisitor (Neutral Killer)[/color]** > > Passive: No one expects the Spanish Inquisition!: You are immune to death poison, and bleeding, and your visits don't count as visits. > > Passive: Rivalry: Your primary ability has a one day cool down until the other Neutral Killer dies. > > Day Ability: Find Magic: Find out if someone is a magic user at the start of the night. Unlimited uses. Magic users are: > * Psychic/Ilusionist > * Priest/Soulcatcher > * Court Wizard/Sage > * Sorcerer > * Paladin > * Princess/Duchess > > Day Ability: Holy hand grenade:Target player will die at the end of the next night. Bypasses everything except healing. Does not notify the target. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Ruthless Efficiency: Kill a target. Cool down does not trigger if you kill a magic user. Unlimited uses.
Note: Sorcerer/Inquisitor would have Reaper/Possessor win condition, and become the Psycho King.

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I added @NuclearBurrito’s suggestion of giving Starting King only 4 guards.

Read full topic

I have never seen a Sorc win but numbers canxt lie I guess

Read full topic

Actually Sorcerer is. Her winrate is 15% btw

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
Could be but, does reaper really need such a big buff? To me it seems like reaper is the NK that wins the most.

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
psychoneirik:

As for the reaper, I think editing reaped people’s logs would be too powerful, I think just being able to read them would be enough since it would help you fake claim easier, and you could even make a believable obs claim.

Actually being able to read someone’s logs early (without editing them) is borderline useless. You only have access to hidden Information for 1 night at most and people also would know that you do.

Editing logs makes it harder to discover the existence of a reaper while also giving you a way to deal with someone who knows who you are (chill them and then reap them). It makes Reaper more interesting much like what facelift did for poss.

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Fool can never start as King. It’s mainly there so Fool doesn’t change goal when crowned.

Starting Fool King would be stupid. But it is your fault for crowning them.

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
I really like Sorc/Inq rework. As for the reaper, I think editing reaped people’s logs would be too powerful, I think just being able to read them would be enough since it would help you fake claim easier, and you could even make a believable obs claim.

Also I do not think fool king would work unless something is changed. You can get rid of the fool by letting a prince, knight or hunter kill him, or even just ignoring him, but if you get a fool king you are stuck with him unless you have a butler. And you cant really ignore him because he has too much power as the king.

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The protective king might.

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Or are you talking about having other people prove stuff? Because I’m pretty sure no one really minds about protective king having one ability different from the 95% other kings found in Good, Evil, and Vengeful Kings.

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Livicus:

Is it just me or should Mage Armor remove the part of Sorcerer being immune to Poison and Bleeding? Because that was done because Inquisitor was slaying Sorcerer but now that they’re semi-equal.

If you remove this, they both could get screwed by bleeding. All NKs need a method to deal with this.

Livicus:

And also, I think all-non protective Kings should get some sort of Starting King Day Ability.

Possibly. I think the King is strong enough as is though.

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Is it just me or should Mage Armor remove the part of Sorcerer being immune to Poison and Bleeding? Because that was done because Inquisitor was slaying Sorcerer but now that they’re semi-equal.

And also, I think all-non protective Kings should get some sort of Starting King Day Ability.

Maybe something supportive or social?

Royal Decree: (D) (2)
Make another player immune to accusals today.

Royal Order: (D) (2)
Choose a player and prevent all Day Abilities that target them today.
(Does not count for abilities like Prince’s Jail or Sheriff’s Scout that affect the night stage)

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer and King Reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Chocolate:

“THE KILLS ARE OUT OF CONTROL IT’S THE KING”

If you are really worries about that as king then just only attack every other night until you need to. It’s not like you HAVE to attack every night.

Plus it might even take too long for it to be noticable to matter in some cases.

Read full topic
